name: Aircraft in Pixels: Parts Cutting Demo
name_original: Aircraft in Pixels: Parts Cutting Demo
description:
This is a quick demo of a feature I'm working on for Aircraft in Pixels. 

Soon you'll be able to cut out the major parts that were constructed from plywood sheet  as part of the building process in Aircraft in Pixels! The particular part in this demo is the former at station #6 on the Albatros D.V, which was directly in from of the pilot.

Enjoy!

If you like this, you might be interested in our Virtual Albatros Model Airplane Kit.

And, if you really like this, consider supporting Aircraft in Pixels on Patreon!
